channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Atakan Yenel

item.title: Predictive Auto Scaling Application
item.description: “PASSA (Predictive Auto Scaling Application) \”is an open source tool for scaling cloud applications at specific datetimes. It checks the state of applications and VMs on the cloud and notifies any inconsistencies between the desired state and the current deployed state.”
